name: Historical Data - POR - Month 1
sqlExpression: SELECT ISNULL(SUM([TotalAmount]), 0) as value FROM [PurchaseOrder] WHERE FORMAT([Date], 'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(DATEADD(month, 0, GETDATE()), 'yyyy-MM')
productionSqlExpression: SELECT Sum(Nz([TotalAmount],0)) AS value FROM [PurchaseOrder] WHERE Format([Date],"yyyy-mm") = Format(DateAdd("m",0,Date()),"yyyy-mm")

name: Historical Data - POR - Month 2
sqlExpression: SELECT ISNULL(SUM([TotalAmount]), 0) as value FROM [PurchaseOrder] WHERE FORMAT([Date], 'yyyy-MM') = FORMAT(DATEADD(month, -1, GETDATE()), 'yyyy-MM')
productionSqlExpression: SELECT Sum(Nz([TotalAmount],0)) AS value FROM [PurchaseOrder] WHERE Format([Date],"yyyy-mm") = Format(DateAdd("m",-1,Date()),"yyyy-mm")
